1.Name: Dog
1.Description: Look how cute he is! We only have one dog, so we'll clone it and send you a puppy!

2.Name: Cat
2.Description: Look how cute she is! We only have one cat, so we'll clone it and send you a kitty!

3.Name: Guinea Pig
3.Description: Look how cute he is! We only have one guinea pig, so we'll clone it and send you a piggy!
